THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08-01-2018,

Hr....

Beer
2018/KER/690
B. KEMAL PASHA, J.
Crl.M.C.No.109 of 2018
Dated this the 8" day of January, 2018
ORDER
Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner.
2. In the event of surrender of the petitioner before
the court below within 3 weeks from today, the court below
shall consider and dispose of the application seeking bail, if
any, that may be filed by the petitioner before the court below
with advance notice to the learned Public Prosecutor in
charge of the case, on the date of filing itself.
This Crl.M.C. is disposed of as above.
Sd/-
B. KEMAL PASHA
JUDGE
